author: Scott M. "Scott M."

review: I've owned/used pretty much all the streaming devices out there, and this one is the best.  Most well-designed interface, smoothest operation, best WiFi performance (that is critical, folks).  Outperforms Roku by quite a bit, makes most smart TV and gaming console interfaces look like absolute garbage.A lot of other people have already described the features in detail, so I'll just say, the highlights for me personally are:- Seamless integration with Prime- Best interface available on the market today- Really, really reliable WiFi performance.  I get full HD streaming 98% of the time, and I have terrible Comcast internet service.If you are debating between this and a Roku of some kind, GET THIS.  I've owned three gens of Roku and this is a million times better.
